metadata.title: CVE-2018-3721 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: lodash node module before 4.17.5 suffers from a Modification of Assumed-Immutable Data (MAID) vulnerability via defaultsDeep, merge, and mergeWith functions, which allows a malicious user to modify the prototype of "Object" via __proto__, causing the addition or modification of an existing property that will exist on all objects.

criterions.comment: node-lodash package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.17.11+dfsg-2').
